original_text: So the five Amorite kings with their armies met together. They were the kings of Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lachish and Eglon. They put their soldiers near Gibeon city, and they began to attack it.
korean_text: 아모리 족속의 다섯 왕들 곧 예루살렘 왕과 헤브론 왕과 야르뭇 왕과 라기스 왕과 에글론 왕이 함께 모여 자기들의 모든 군대를 거느리고 올라와 기브온에 대진하고 싸우니라

sentences.original_text: They were the kings of Jerusalem
They put their soldiers near Gibeon city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기브온 성 근처에 군사들을 배치했다

sentences.original_text: and they began to attack it
